D

defaultBodyType - Static variable in class box2d.B2DBody
defaultBodyType defines the default BodyType of a B2DBody instance.
defaultMargin(Node) - Static method in class display.Layout
Sets the default margins for every visible screen element.
destroy() - Method in class box2d.B2DBody
Removes all references to this B2DBody instance from the World it had been created in.
dimensions - Variable in class box2d.B2DBody
The dimensions Vec2 contains the values for the dimensions of the B2DBody for rendering purposes.
disableAutoRepeat() - Method in class display.TestScreen
Calling this method disable automatic repetition of a test.
disableFollow() - Method in class box2d.B2DCamera
Disables the follow feature for both axis.
disableGird() - Method in class display.Screen
Calling this method will show the grid.
disableInfo() - Method in class display.Screen
Calling this method will disable an information string being written in the top left corner of this Screen.
disableMarkers() - Method in class display.Screen
Calling this method disables the distance labels.
disableScrollZoom() - Method in class display.Screen
Calling this method disables framing by the user.
display - package display
 
do10Gen() - Method in class display.PopScreenControl
This method is called when 10 whole generations should be calculated.
do1Gen() - Method in class display.PopScreenControl
This method is called when one whole generation should be calculated.
dragCamera(MouseEvent) - Method in class display.Screen
This method is called by a MouseEvent pressed-dragging the mouse.
dragCameraEnded(MouseEvent) - Method in class display.Screen
This method is called by a MouseEvent when ending a mouse drag.
dragCameraStarted(MouseEvent) - Method in class display.Screen
This method is called by a MouseEvent when starting a mouse drag.
dragging - Variable in class display.Screen
Holds the current state of the mouse being dragged on the Screen
dragMousePos - Variable in class display.Screen
Holds the position Vec2 of the current mouse position while dragging.
drawBody(B2DBody) - Method in class display.Screen
This universal method takes any B2DBody and draws it to the according coordinates on the Screen.
drawColor - Variable in class box2d.B2DBody
drawColor specifies the Color in which the B2DBody is rendered.
drawCross(B2DBody) - Method in class display.Screen
This method draws a B2DBody with the BodyType POINT to the according coordinates on the Screen.
drawCuboid(B2DBody) - Method in class display.Screen
This method draws a B2DBody with the BodyType CUBOID to the according coordinates on the Screen.
drawFill - Variable in class box2d.B2DBody
drawFill specifies whether the B2DBody is rendered filled or as a frame.
drawGrid() - Method in class display.Screen
This method draws the grid to the Screen.
drawInfo() - Method in class display.Screen
This method draws the information string in the top left corner of this Screen instance.
drawLine(Vec2, Vec2, Color) - Method in class display.Screen
This method takes two B2D coordinates as Vec2 vectors and draws a line in the given colour.
drawMarkers() - Method in class display.Screen
This method draws the distance labels to the Screen.
drawMuscle(RevoluteJoint) - Method in class display.Screen
This method draws a line between two B2DBones.
drawPxCircle(float, float, float, float, Color, boolean) - Method in class display.Screen
This methods takes pixel coordinates and dimensions and draws a circle to the Screen
drawPxLineCircle(float, float, float, float, Color, boolean) - Method in class display.Screen
This methods takes pixel coordinates and draws a circle with a line form the centre to a fixed point to the perimeter.
drawPxRect(Vec2, Vec2, float, Color, boolean) - Method in class display.Screen
This methods takes pixel coordinates and draws a circle with a line form the centre to a fixed point to the perimeter.
drawPxRect(float, float, float, float, Color, boolean) - Method in class display.Screen
This methods takes pixel coordinates and dimensions and draws a rectangle to the Screen
drawScore(float) - Method in class display.Screen
This method draws a labelled marker at a given x-coordinate.
drawSphere(B2DBody) - Method in class display.Screen
This method draws a B2DBody with the BodyType CIRCLE to the according coordinates on the Screen.
drawTimer(float, float) - Method in class display.Screen
This method draws a timer in the top right corner of the Screen.
drawTimer(float, float, float) - Method in class display.Screen
This method draws a timer with the play-back speed in the top right corner of the Screen.
